revised_title: Lithotomy Operation on Women: Innovations and Techniques by Mons. le Cat
tldr: Mons. le Cat describes his lateral method of lithotomy for women, using a grooved staff and a modified urethrotome. He also introduces a new, all-in-one instrument called the 'Gorgeret Urethro-cistitome' for both men and women. The author shares his successful cases and improvements in the surgical technique.
